item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Hacker Herald – like HN but with crowdsourced pics and subtitles (93 points | 30 comments)
2. Show HN: Prompt Engine – Auto pick LLMs based on your prompts (27 points | 6 comments)
3. Show HN: BunkerWeb – The Open-Source Web Application Firewall (WAF) (11 points | discuss)
4. Trailbase: Fast, single-file, open-source app server built using Rust and SQLite (232 points | 81 comments)
5. Why is printer ink so expensive? (19 points | 11 comments)
6. Show HN: Piazza, syncing the web in a vectorized DB (4 points | discuss)
7. Can a Comma Solve a Crime? (14 points | 7 comments)
8. ChatGPT Pro (742 points | 1061 comments)
9. Portland airport grows with expansive mass timber roof canopy (315 points | 193 comments)
10. Install Docker Natively on Android Phone and Use It as a Home Server (6 points | 1 comment)
11. ExxonMobil's Alleged Hack-for-Hire Campaign Targeting Climate Activists (16 points | discuss)
12. RNA-targeting CRISPR reveals that noncoding RNAs are not 'junk' (11 points | 1 comment)
13. RankScience (YC W17) is hiring to supercharge SEO for startups ( | hide)
14. The 70% problem: Hard truths about AI-assisted coding (388 points | 311 comments)
15. Contradictions in Photography Advice (23 points | 35 comments)

17. Gitlab names Bill Staples as new CEO (229 points | 208 comments)

19. Lossless Log Aggregation - Reduce Log Volume by 99% Without Dropping Data (98 points | 57 comments)
20. The Problem with Sci-Fi Body Armor (83 points | 24 comments)
21. Optimizing a Rust GPU matmul kernel (77 points | 6 comments)
22. PaliGemma 2: Powerful Vision-Language Models, Simple Fine-Tuning (196 points | 24 comments)
23. Show HN: Banan-OS, an Unix-like operating system written from scratch (296 points | 41 comments)
24. I spent a year building an Android course for the elderly (172 points | 77 comments)
25. Building the Ultimate Pi Kubernetes Cluster: A Journey into Cloud Scalability (16 points | 3 comments)
26. Rivian Is Opening Its Charging Network to Other EVs (6 points | discuss)
27. Litdb – type safe SQL for JavaScript/TS (94 points | 58 comments)
28. A transport protocol's view of Starlink (127 points | 25 comments)
29. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (128 points | 29 comments)
30. Romanian court annuls result of presidential election first round (31 points | 15 comments)
